text: 🚨Russian troops advance in eastern Ukraine! 💥 Oleksandr Syrskyi, Ukraine's commander-in-chief, announced on Telegram that Russian forces are making significant gains near Avdiivka. 💪🏽 both sides claim control over Bohdanivka. 🔥 intense fighting continues in Donetsk region. 🤔 Ukraine's Defense Ministry acknowledges Russian advantage in firepower & personnel. 💣 what's next for Ukraine? 🤔
